dcterms:creator: Ziyang Lu
Yunqiang Pei
Guoqing Wang
Yang Yang
Zheng Wang
Heng Tao Shen
dcterms:description: A semi-synthetic dataset for the Embodied Reference Understanding (ERU) task, constructed to evaluate the effectiveness of incorporating textual, real-world visual, and synthetic gestural information in 3D visual grounding.
dcterms:title: ScanERU

dcterms:creator: Dave Zhenyu Chen
Angel X Chang
Matthias Nießner
dcterms:description: A dataset for 3D object localization in RGB-D scans using natural language, providing a comprehensive end-to-end framework based on 3D point clouds.
dcterms:title: ScanRefer

dcterms:creator: Angela Dai
Angel X. Chang
Manolis Savva
Maciej Halber
Thomas Funkhouser
Matthias Nießner
dcterms:description: A richly-annotated dataset of 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, providing a comprehensive resource for various tasks in 3D computer vision.
dcterms:title: ScanNet

dcterms:creator: Panos Achlioptas
Ahmed Abdelreheem
Fei Xia
Mohamed Elhoseiny
Leonidas J. Guibas
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for fine-grained 3D object identification in real-world scenes, focusing on neural listeners that can understand and localize objects based on natural language queries.
dcterms:title: ReferIt3D

dcterms:creator: Yixin Chen
Qing Li
Deqian Kong
Yik Lun Kei
Song-Chun Zhu
Tao Gao
Yixin Zhu
Siyuan Huang
dcterms:description: A dataset that combines language and gesture for embodied reference understanding, aimed at improving the accuracy of visual grounding tasks.
dcterms:title: YouRefIt

dcterms:creator: Haolin Liu
Anran Lin
Xiaoguang Han
Lei Yang
Yizhou Yu
Shuguang Cui
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a bottom-up approach for 3D visual grounding in RGBD images, focusing on the integration of language and visual data.
dcterms:title: Refer-it-in-RGBD
